channel.title: Status
channel.description:
Seemed the best place since you cant post in server status thing.
I'm banned from the status page and I don't know why... Someone explain this please? I posted my server. Next day t was banned :confused: :(
So whats wrong with that? What did I do and stop putting that gay website there. doubt anybody (other than some people *cough*Person who banned me(idk who it was)*cough*
But its making me hurl... especially when im only 13 :mad:
